content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Mr. Li. Based on our discussions, your proposed rental price of $1,500 per month seems reasonable for a 25 square meter apartment in the city. However, I would like to negotiate with you and see if we can come to an agreement on a higher price. Would you be willing to discuss the possibility of a higher rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'm sorry, I don't think I can accept the price of 1500 euro. Can we discuss further?
name: Bo Li from China

content: Of course, Mr. Li. I understand that $1,500 per month may not be within your budget. Is there a specific price range that you are comfortable with? Additionally, I would like to know more about your needs and what you are looking for in an apartment to determine if we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like a price of 1200 euro per month. Is that possible?

My needs are simple, I just need a safe and comfortable place to live. I don't need any fancy amenities or anything. I'm willing to compromise on the price if you have any concerns.

I also want to be on good terms with my landlord, I don't want any problems in the future.

Please let me know if you can accept my offer.

Thanks for your time.

Best regards,

Bo Li
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your offer, Mr. Li. I appreciate your willingness to compromise and find a mutually beneficial agreement. I will consider your offer of €1,200 per month, but I would like to clarify a few things before we finalize the agreement.

Firstly, I would like to know if you are willing to sign a lease for a minimum of one year. This will provide stability for both of us and ensure that the rental payments are made on time.

Secondly, I would like to know if you are willing to pay the first month's rent upfront. This will help me cover my expenses and ensure that I have a steady income from the rental payments.

Finally, I would like to know if you are willing to pay for any additional costs such as maintenance or repairs that may be necessary during your tenancy.

If we can come to an agreement on these terms, I would be happy to accept your offer of €1,200 per month. Please let me know if you have any concerns or if there is anything else we can discuss.
name: Heinrich Heine
